definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: Drainage was to the north and individual channels bifurcate in that direction .
sentences.chinese: 整个水系向北排水，各个河道朝该方向分叉。

sentences.english: It flows from central Africa 6670 km north to the Mediterranean Sea .
sentences.chinese: 它从非洲中部向北流入地中海，全长6670公里。

sentences.english: This army gradually forced its way northward.
sentences.chinese: 这支军队逐步强行向北推进。

sentences.english: She left Eatonville and moved north when she was fourteen years old.
sentences.chinese: 十四岁时，她离开了伊顿威尔镇，向北寻求新生活。

sentences.english: The whaling fleet began to fill away on a northerly course.
sentences.chinese: 捕鲸船队开始向北乘风前进。

sentences.english: From Antarctica, three major " gulfs " extend northward.
sentences.chinese: 有三个大的“海湾”从南极洲向北延伸。

sentences.english: He then turned north and hurried towards Pear Fragrance Court.
sentences.chinese: 于是转弯向北奔梨香院来。

sentences.english: If you drive, get on the Third Ring Road and head north.
sentences.chinese: 如果你开车，就上三环路然后向北。

sentences.english: The escapee ran quickly northward and cut back to the original place.
sentences.chinese: 逃犯迅速向北跑去，然后又忽然回到原地。

sentences.english: They escaped into the Mississippi River and have migrated northward ever since.
sentences.chinese: 它们逃到了密西西比河，并从那时起一直向北迁移。

sentences.english: The majestic Rocky Mountains stretch all the way from Mexico to the Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 巍巍的落基山脉南起墨西哥一直向北延伸到北极圈。

sentences.english: The bus passed by the edge of the railway station and turned north.
sentences.chinese: 这辆公共汽车从火车站边经过，然后向北拐。

sentences.english: Destroy this one and continue north until you run into another Dominion Marine.
sentences.chinese: 摧毁这一座然后继续向北直到你到达另一座。

sentences.english: Suppose a wind is blowing from the Gulf of Mexico northward across the southeast United States.
sentences.chinese: 一股风正从墨西哥湾向北吹，横扫美国西南部。

sentences.english: The width of the world began somewhere south of the Mediterranean and ran northward.
sentences.chinese: 地球的宽度从地中海的南部某个地方开始并且向北跑。

sentences.english: At minimum, that would unsettleJapanto the north and thePhilippinesto the south.
sentences.chinese: 至少，坐拥台湾能够向北牵制日本，南扼菲律宾。

definition: south/south side/southern part/to the south of
north/north side/northern part/to the north of
along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
west/west side/western part/to the west of
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
